annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: ΕΝ
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. On receipt of a designation by a Member State, Georgia shall grant the appropriate authorisations and permissions with minimum procedural delay, provided that:
annotations.translation: 2. 格鲁吉亚在收到成员国的指定后，应给予适当的授权和许可，尽量减少程序上的拖延，前提是：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) the air carrier is established, under the Treaty establishing the European Community, in the territory of the designating Member State and has a valid Operating Licence in accordance with European Community law;
annotations.translation: (i) 根据建立欧洲共同体的条约，该航空承运人在指定的成员国境内成立，并拥有符合欧洲共同体法律的有效运营执照；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) effective regulatory control of the air carrier is exercised and maintained by the Member State responsible for issuing its Air Operators Certificate and the relevant aeronautical authority is clearly identified in the designation; and
annotations.translation: (ii) 负责颁发航空运营人证书的成员国对航空承运人实施和维持有效的监管控制，并在指定中明确指出相关航空管理部门；及

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) the air carrier is owned and shall continue to be owned directly or through majority ownership by Member States and/or nationals of Member States, or by other States listed in Annex III and/or nationals of such other States, and shall at all times be effectively controlled by such States and/or such nationals.
annotations.translation: (iii) 航空承运人由成员国和/或成员国国民、或附件三所列其他国家和/或这些其他国家国民直接或通过多数股权拥有并应继续拥有，并且应在任何时候都受到这些国家和/或国民的有效控制。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. Georgia may refuse, revoke, suspend or limit the authorisations or permissions of an air carrier designated by a Member State where:
annotations.translation: 3. 在下列情况下，格鲁吉亚可以拒绝、撤销、暂停或限制成员国指定的航空承运人的授权或许可：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) the air carrier is not established, under the Treaty estab lishing the European Community, in the territory of the designating Member State or does not have a valid Operating Licence in accordance with European Community law;
annotations.translation: (i) 根据建立欧洲共同体的条约，航空承运人未在指定成员国的领土上成立，或者根据欧洲共同体法律，没有有效的运营许可证；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) effective regulatory control of the air carrier is not exercised or not maintained by the Member State responsible for issuing its Air Operators Certificate, or the relevant aeronautical authority is not clearly identified in the designation; or
annotations.translation: (ii) 负责签发航空运营人证书的成员国未对航空承运人行使或维持有效的监管控制，或者在指定中未明确指出有关航空管理部门；或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) the air carrier is not owned and effectively controlled directly or through majority ownership by Member States and/or nationals of Member States, or by other states listed in Annex III and/or nationals of such other States.
annotations.translation: (iii) 航空承运人不是由成员国和/或成员国国民、附件三所列其他国家和/或这些其他国家的国民直接或通过多数所有权拥有和有效控制的。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In exercising its right under this paragraph, Georgia shall not discriminate between Community air carriers on the grounds of nationality.
annotations.translation: 格鲁吉亚在行使本款规定的权利时，不得以国籍为由区别对待共同体航空承运人。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 3
annotations.translation: 第 3 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Rights with regard to regulatory control
annotations.translation: 与监管控制有关的权利

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The provisions in paragraph 2 of this Article shall complement the Articles listed in Annex II(c).
annotations.translation: 1. 本条第 2 款的规定是附件二 (c) 中所列条款的补充。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Where a Member State has designated an air carrier whose regulatory control is exercised and maintained by another Member State, the rights of Georgia under the safety provisions of the Agreement between the Member State that has designated the air carrier and Georgia shall apply equally in respect of the adoption, exercise or maintenance of safety standards by that other Member State and in respect of the operating authorisation of that air carrier.
annotations.translation: 2. 如果某一成员国指定了由另一成员国行使和维持监管控制的航空承运人，则格鲁吉亚根据指定该航空承运人的成员国与格鲁吉亚之间的协定的安全条款所享有的权利应同样适用于该另一成员国采用、行使或维持安全标准以及该航空承运人的经营授权。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 4
annotations.translation: 第 4 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Taxation of aviation fuel
annotations.translation: 航空燃料税

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The provisions in paragraph 2 of this Article shall complement the corresponding provisions in the Articles listed in Annex II(d).
annotations.translation: 1. 本条第 2 款的规定是对附件二 (d) 所列各相应规定的补充。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Notwithstanding any other provision to the contrary, nothing in each of the Agreements listed in Annex II(d) shall prevent a Member State from imposing taxes, levies, duties, fees or charges on fuel supplied in its territory for use in an aircraft of a designated air carrier of Georgia that operates between a point in the territory of that Member State and another point in the territory of that Member State or in the territory of another Member State.
annotations.translation: 2. 无论是否有任何相反的规定，当格鲁吉亚指定航空承运人的航空器在某一成员国境内的某点与该成员国境内或另一成员国境内的某点之间运行时，附件二 (d) 所列各个协定中的规定概不妨碍该成员国对该航空器在其境内使用的燃料征税、征费、关税、费用或收费。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 5
annotations.translation: 第 5 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Tariffs for carriage within the European Community
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体内的运输关税

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The provisions in paragraph 2 of this Article shall complement the articles listed in Annex II(e).
annotations.translation: 1. 本条第 2 款的规定是对附件二 (e) 所列条款的补充。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. The tariffs to be charged by the air carrier(s) designated by Georgia under an agreement listed in Annex I containing a provision listed in Annex II(e) for carriage wholly within the European Community shall be subject to European Community law.
annotations.translation: 2. 格鲁吉亚根据附件一所列协议含附件二 (e) 所列条款指定的航空承运人对完全在欧洲共同体内运输所收取的运价应遵守欧洲共同体法律。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 6
annotations.translation: 第 6 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Annexes to the Agreement
annotations.translation: 《协定》附件

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Annexes to this Agreement shall form an integral part thereof.
annotations.translation: 本《协定》附件是本协定的组成部分。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 7
annotations.translation: 第 7 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Revision or amendment
annotations.translation: 修改或修订

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Parties may, at any time , revise or amend this Agreement by mutual consent.
annotations.translation: 经各方同意，各方可随时修改或修订本协定。
